ROOT.GetPlantByDcc: SELECT L.ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_B L JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON L.START_ST_ID=P.ID WHERE P.DCC_ID={0} and P.operate_state=1003 UNION SELECT L.ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_B L JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON L.END_ST_ID=P.ID WHERE P.DCC_ID={0} and P.operate_state=1003
